SCTX:
Begin ColonyAssassinItems

;Controls enabling/disabling of items and NPC needed for quest CO_12/CO_12a

if ( GetJournalIndex "CO_12" < 10 )
	if ( GetDisabled "Cimber Valerius" == 0 )
		"Cimber Valerius"->Disable
		"Capiton Popillius"->Disable
	endif
endif


if ( GetJournalIndex "CO_12a" < 10 )
	if ( "steel arrow_carnius"->GetDisabled == 0 )
		"steel arrow_carnius"->Disable
		"steel longbow_carnius"->Disable
		"sc_hiddenkiller"->Disable
		"Baslod"->Disable
	endif
endif

if ( GetJournalIndex "CO_12a" >= 10 )
	if ( "steel arrow_carnius"->GetDisabled == 1 )
		"steel arrow_carnius"->Enable
		"steel longbow_carnius"->Enable
		"sc_hiddenkiller"->Enable
	endif
endif

if ( GetJournalIndex "CO_12a" == 20 )
	if ( "Baslod"->GetDisabled == 1 )
		"Baslod"->Enable
	endif
endif

StopScript ColonyAssassinItems

End
